Class CardService

java.lang.Object
com.example.card_management_system.service.CardService
@Service public class CardService extends Object
Service class for managing bank cards.

Handles operations such as creating, blocking, activating, deleting cards, retrieving all cards, and retrieving cards by user.

  • Method Details

    • createCard

      public CardDto createCard(CardDto cardDto) throws Exception
      Creates a new card for a user. The card number is encrypted before being saved, and the returned DTO contains a masked version of the number.
      Parameters:
      cardDto - DTO containing card details to be created
      Returns:
      CardDto with masked card number
      Throws:
      Exception - if encryption fails

    • blockCard

      public Card blockCard(Long id)
      Blocks a card by setting its status to "BLOCKED".
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the card to block
      Returns:
      the updated Card object
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the card is not found

    • activateCard

      public Card activateCard(Long id)
      Activates a card by setting its status to "ACTIVE".
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the card to activate
      Returns:
      the updated Card object
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the card is not found

    • deleteCard

      public void deleteCard(Long id)
      Deletes a card by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the card to delete

    • getAllCards

      public List<CardDto> getAllCards()
      Retrieves all cards from the system and masks their card numbers.
      Returns:
      list of CardDto objects with masked card numbers

    • getAllUserCards

      public List<CardDto> getAllUserCards(Long userId)
      Retrieves all cards that belong to a specific user and masks their card numbers.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      list of CardDto objects for the user

    • getCard

      public Card getCard(Long id)
      Retrieves a card by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the card
      Returns:
      the Card object
